Name: Jericho's Prophecies
About the game: Based on the novel 'Las Profecias de Jerico' by German Ramos Briñez, Jericho's Prophecies is a short kinetic visual novel, no other game is required to fully understand it More than 1700 years ago a bedouin found a scroll near the ruins of Jericho and handed it over to the religious hierarchy gathered in Nicea of ​​Bithynia, but the synod of bishops dismissed it and the scroll was hidden until it was lost among thousands of codices contrary to the interests of the self-appointed rectors of the law; However, the Bedouin told the story to many men who repeated it to this day. Ancestral masters reproduced the story and secretly studied the signs that would mark the precise time and place for the advent of the antichrist; they have prepared and strengthened to change the course of history, the battle will be subtle and imperceptible to the one who has eyes but does not see. Just as the promised land flourished with the Father's blessing, the evil one will send his offspring to hostile lands where vices and money have built walls of comfort. Jericho's prophecy is the destiny of humanity.
